Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by San Francisco in 1986...
Injured on 5/1/1987 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/23/1990 with a Broken Foot, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 6/16/1990 (Going to SF: P J. Habyan. Going to CIN: 1B P. Sorrento)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1992, off Danny Jackson (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1992, off Ben McDonald (PIT)...
